QuestData.Title: A Lack of Wasps
QuestData.Description: The stings! These cursed wasps drone day and night and their constant aggression taxes me so.$b$bI shall do nothing about your offer until these nuisances are dealt with.
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps my rituals will be undisturbed for a few nights at least. Your offer is intriguing and I think we can come to an agreement.
